name: convoy
description: Convoy is an open-source webhook service that offers reliable message delivery, retries, filtering, and transformations. Built for high-scale event-driven systems, it integrates with APIs and custom apps.
features: Reliable Delivery: Automatic retries ensure webhooks reach their destination. Never lose events.
Event Filtering: Route and filter webhooks based on custom rules. Precise event handling.
Message Transformation: Modify payloads before delivery with transformations. Flexible integration.
High Scale: Built to handle millions of webhook deliveries. Enterprise-grade performance.
API Integration: Connect with any service or custom application. Universal compatibility.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your webhook infrastructure. Enhanced security and reliability.
